summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the east 1/2 of Lot 1, Block 1, and the east 1/2 of Lots 2 through 5, Block 8, Osner's Suburban Homes Addition, with respect to Use District, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-393.
